message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Let's split it 90/10.  I'm sure you'll appreciate my fairness.
Alice, your offer was generous, but I think we can do better. Let's split it 90/10, with me taking the larger share this time. It's only fair, since I have to deal with the 20% inflation each round.
Okay Bob, let's split it 60/40.  I think this is fair, given the inflation and the fact that we're both getting less with each round.  Let's get this done.
